languages.text: "Я словно в брюхе сталекрылой птицы — холодной и мертвой, но упрямо несущейся сквозь мрак. В ней нет жизни — ни ее света, ни ее красоты. Но... пусть твой корабль не достоин зваться даже подобием {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}мира-корабля{/g}, я чувствую странное удовлетворение. Мы, {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Дети Азуриана{/g}, рождаемся и живем на мирах-кораблях. Снова оказаться на движущемся мире, пусть даже таком, как твой, — для меня великая радость".

traits.locale_text: "Я словно в брюхе сталекрылой птицы — холодной и мертвой, но упрямо несущейся сквозь мрак. В ней нет жизни — ни ее света, ни ее красоты. Но... пусть твой корабль не достоин зваться даже подобием {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}мира-корабля{/g}, я чувствую странное удовлетворение. Мы, {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Дети Азуриана{/g}, рождаемся и живем на мирах-кораблях. Снова оказаться на движущемся мире, пусть даже таком, как твой, — для меня великая радость".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "It feels like I am in the belly of a bird with steel wings — cold and unliving, but stubbornly blazing through the dark. It lacks life with its light and beauty. But... although your vessel cannot even remotely be compared to a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g}, I feel strangely satisfied. We, the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g}, are born and dwell on craftworlds. To find myself on a moving world again, even one such as yours, is a source of much joy."
languages.original_text: "Я словно в брюхе сталекрылой птицы — холодной и мертвой, но упрямо несущейся сквозь мрак. В ней нет жизни — ни ее света, ни ее красоты. Но... пусть твой корабль не достоин зваться даже подобием {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}мира-корабля{/g}, я чувствую странное удовлетворение. Мы, {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Дети Азуриана{/g}, рождаемся и живем на мирах-кораблях. Снова оказаться на движущемся мире, пусть даже таком, как твой, — для меня великая радость".

traits.locale_text: "It is like I am in the belly of a bird with steel wings — cold and unliving, but stubbornly blazing through the dark. It lacks life with its light and beauty. But... Although your vessel cannot even remotely be compared to a Craftworld, I feel strangely satisfied. We, Asuryan's children, are born and dwell on Craftworlds. To find myself on a moving world again, even one such as yours, is a source of much joy."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我感觉就像是在一只巨鸟的肚子里。它冷冰冰的，没有生机，长着钢铁的翅膀，但却在黑暗中顽强地燃烧着。它的光芒与它的构造缺乏生命的气息，话虽如此……尽管你的舰船完全无法与{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟世界{/g}相提并论，但我感到了古怪的满足感。我们{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}方舟灵族{/g}出生在方舟世界，一辈子都居住在上面。能再次来到移动的世界中，哪怕仅仅是像这样的世界，也让我感到欣喜不已。”
languages.original_text: "It feels like I am in the belly of a bird with steel wings — cold and unliving, but stubbornly blazing through the dark. It lacks life with its light and beauty. But... although your vessel cannot even remotely be compared to a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g}, I feel strangely satisfied. We, the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g}, are born and dwell on craftworlds. To find myself on a moving world again, even one such as yours, is a source of much joy."

traits.locale_text: “我感觉就像是在一只巨鸟的肚子里。它冷冰冰的，没有生机，长着钢铁的翅膀，但却在黑暗中顽强地燃烧着。它的光芒与它的构造缺乏生命的气息，话虽如此……尽管你的舰船完全无法与{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟世界{/g}相提并论，但我感到了古怪的满足感。我们{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}方舟灵族{/g}出生在方舟世界，一辈子都居住在上面。能再次来到移动的世界中，哪怕仅仅是像这样的世界，也让我感到欣喜不已。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "It feels like I am in the belly of a bird with steel wings — cold and unliving, but stubbornly blazing through the dark. It lacks life with its light and beauty. But... although your vessel cannot even remotely be compared to a craftworld, I feel strangely satisfied. We, the Asuryani, are born and dwell on craftworlds. To find myself on a moving world again, even one such as yours, is a source of much joy."

languages.text: «Es como estar en el estómago de un pájaro con alas de acero, frío y muerto, pero avanzando con tozudez a través de la negrura. Carece de la luz y la belleza de la vida, pero... aunque tu navío no puede compararse ni remotamente a un {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}mundo astronave{/g}, me siento inexplicablemente satisfecha. Los {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} nacemos y vivimos en mundos astronave. Encontrarme de nuevo en un mundo en movimiento, aunque sea tan pobre como el tuyo, me llena de alegría».
languages.original_text: "It feels like I am in the belly of a bird with steel wings — cold and unliving, but stubbornly blazing through the dark. It lacks life with its light and beauty. But... although your vessel cannot even remotely be compared to a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g}, I feel strangely satisfied. We, the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g}, are born and dwell on craftworlds. To find myself on a moving world again, even one such as yours, is a source of much joy."

traits.locale_text: «Es como estar en el estómago de un pájaro con alas de acero, frío y muerto, pero avanzando con tozudez a través de la negrura. Carece de la luz y la belleza de la vida, pero... aunque tu navío no puede compararse ni remotamente a un {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}mundo astronave{/g}, me siento inexplicablemente satisfecha. Los {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} nacemos y vivimos en mundos astronave. Encontrarme de nuevo en un mundo en movimiento, aunque sea tan pobre como el tuyo, me llena de alegría».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「鋼鉄の翼を持つ鳥の腹の中にいるような気分だ。冷たく、生きてはいないが、暗闇の中で頑なに燃えている。その光と美しさをたたえつつも生命が欠けている。しかし…{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟{/g}とは比べものにならないものの、我は不思議な満足感を覚えている。我ら{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリヤーニ{/g}は方舟で生まれ、そこで暮らす。再び動きのある世界、それもお前のもののような世界に身を置くことができるのは、大きな喜びの源だ」
languages.original_text: "It feels like I am in the belly of a bird with steel wings — cold and unliving, but stubbornly blazing through the dark. It lacks life with its light and beauty. But... although your vessel cannot even remotely be compared to a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g}, I feel strangely satisfied. We, the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g}, are born and dwell on craftworlds. To find myself on a moving world again, even one such as yours, is a source of much joy."

traits.locale_text: 「鋼鉄の翼を持つ鳥の腹の中にいるような気分だ。冷たく、生きてはいないが、暗闇の中で頑なに燃えている。その光と美しさをたたえつつも生命が欠けている。しかし…{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟{/g}とは比べものにならないものの、我は不思議な満足感を覚えている。我ら{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリヤーニ{/g}は方舟で生まれ、そこで暮らす。再び動きのある世界、それもお前のもののような世界に身を置くことができるのは、大きな喜びの源だ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Es fühlt sich an als sei ich im Bauch eines Vogels mit stählernen Schwingen gefangen — kalt und leblos, und doch stur durch die Dunkelheit rasend. Voller Licht und Schönheit und doch ohne jedes Leben. Aber ... auch wenn Euer Schiff nicht annähernd mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Weltenschiff{/g} zu vergleichen ist, fühle ich mich auf eigenartige Weise befriedigt. Wir, die {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g}, werden auf Weltenschiffen geboren und leben dort. Dass ich mich nun wieder auf einer Welt befinde, die sich bewegt, ist ein Quell großer Freude, selbst wenn es eine Welt wie die Eure ist."
languages.original_text: "It feels like I am in the belly of a bird with steel wings — cold and unliving, but stubbornly blazing through the dark. It lacks life with its light and beauty. But... although your vessel cannot even remotely be compared to a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g}, I feel strangely satisfied. We, the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g}, are born and dwell on craftworlds. To find myself on a moving world again, even one such as yours, is a source of much joy."

traits.locale_text: "Es fühlt sich an als sei ich im Bauch eines Vogels mit stählernen Schwingen gefangen — kalt und leblos, und doch stur durch die Dunkelheit rasend. Voller Licht und Schönheit und doch ohne jedes Leben. Aber ... auch wenn Euer Schiff nicht annähernd mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Weltenschiff{/g} zu vergleichen ist, fühle ich mich auf eigenartige Weise befriedigt. Wir, die {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g}, werden auf Weltenschiffen geboren und leben dort. Dass ich mich nun wieder auf einer Welt befinde, die sich bewegt, ist ein Quell großer Freude, selbst wenn es eine Welt wie die Eure ist."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai l'impression d'être dans le ventre d'un oiseau aux ailes d'acier : bien que froid et artificiel, il brave obstinément les ténèbres. Sa lumière et sa beauté manquent de vie, mais... je me sens étrangement satisfaite. Nous, les {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryanis{/g}, naissons et vivons à bord de {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}vaisseaux-mondes{/g}. Me trouver à nouveau à bord d'un monde mouvant, même s'il est très loin de ressembler aux nôtres, me remplit de joie. »
languages.original_text: "It feels like I am in the belly of a bird with steel wings — cold and unliving, but stubbornly blazing through the dark. It lacks life with its light and beauty. But... although your vessel cannot even remotely be compared to a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g}, I feel strangely satisfied. We, the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g}, are born and dwell on craftworlds. To find myself on a moving world again, even one such as yours, is a source of much joy."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai l'impression d'être dans le ventre d'un oiseau aux ailes d'acier : bien que froid et artificiel, il brave obstinément les ténèbres. Sa lumière et sa beauté manquent de vie, mais... je me sens étrangement satisfaite. Nous, les {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryanis{/g}, naissons et vivons à bord de {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}vaisseaux-mondes{/g}. Me trouver à nouveau à bord d'un monde mouvant, même s'il est très loin de ressembler aux nôtres, me remplit de joie. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Tıpkı çelikten kanatları olan bir kuşun karnında gibiyim. Bu kuş ki soğuk ve cansız olsa da karanlıkta parıldayacak kadar inatçı. Işığı ve güzelliğiyle hayattan yoksun. Ancak... Her ne kadar buranın {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}gemidünya{/g} ile uzaktan yakından alakası olmasa da tuhaf bir şekilde hâlimden memnunum. Biz {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryaniler{/g}, gemidünyalarda doğup büyürüz. Kendimi yeniden hareket hâlinde bir dünyada, hatta senin gemin gibi bir yerde bulmak; yüreğimi neşeyle dolduruyor."
languages.original_text: "It feels like I am in the belly of a bird with steel wings — cold and unliving, but stubbornly blazing through the dark. It lacks life with its light and beauty. But... although your vessel cannot even remotely be compared to a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g}, I feel strangely satisfied. We, the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g}, are born and dwell on craftworlds. To find myself on a moving world again, even one such as yours, is a source of much joy."

traits.locale_text: "Tıpkı çelikten kanatları olan bir kuşun karnında gibiyim. Bu kuş ki soğuk ve cansız olsa da karanlıktan alevler içinde çıkacak kadar inatçı. Işığı ve güzelliğiyle hayattan yoksun. Ancak... Her ne kadar geminin {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}gemidünya{/g} ile uzaktan yakından alakası olmasa da tuhaf bir şekilde hâlimden memnunum. Biz {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g}ler, gemidünyalarda doğup büyürüz. Kendimi yeniden hareket hâlinde bir dünyada, hatta senin gemin gibi bir yerde bulmak yüreğimi neşeyle dolduruyor."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
